name: SSX Blur
summary: SSX Blur is a snowboarding and skiing video game, published by EA Sports Big and developed by EA Montreal for the Wii video game console. It is the fifth installment in the SSX series. The game was released in the United States on February 27, 2007. The soundtrack was created by Tom Holkenborg. It is a prequel to SSX on Tour, putting it in the timeline between SSX 3 and on Tour. It is the last game in the series to have the EA Sports BIG branding, as the 2012 reboot of SSX would uses the standard EA Sports branding instead.
